name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 is a powerful ultrabook with a sleek design, stunning display, and long battery life.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch is a high-performance laptop with a large Retina display, advanced cooling system, and immersive speakers.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon is a durable business laptop with a lightweight carbon-fiber chassis, excellent keyboard, and long battery life.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 is a versatile ultrabook with a premium build, vibrant PixelSense display, and smooth performance.

name: HP Spectre x360
description: The HP Spectre x360 is a convertible laptop with a stylish design, powerful performance, and long battery life, perfect for both work and entertainment.
